// Automatic rollback on errors
store.transact({
  suspendValidation: true,
  action() {
    this.$.addItem('product1', 5)      // ✅ Success
    this.$.addItem('product2', 3)      // ✅ Success  
    this.$.addItem('invalid-id', 1)    // ❌ Throws error
    // All changes above are automatically rolled back
  }
})

// Handling transaction errors
try {
  store.transact({
    action() {
      this.$.riskyOperation()
    }
  })
} catch (error) {
  console.log('Transaction failed:', error.message)
  // Store state is unchanged
}
